title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid credentials and is routed to the dashboard with correct permissions.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is logged in, redirected to the dashboard, and modules are accessible based on role.
Verify UI loads in less than 2 seconds.

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure login is rejected with invalid credentials and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login fails and error message is shown.

title: Password Recovery Process
description: Validate complete password recovery workflow including email request and reset form accessibility.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page.
Input registered user email.
Submit password recovery request.
Confirm success message prompting to check email.
Open password reset link from email.
Enter and confirm a new password.
Submit reset form.
Ensure user can log in with new password.

title: Student CRUD Operations
description: Test creation, reading, updating, and deletion of student profiles including validation and UI responsiveness.

steps.description: Navigate to the student management module.
Create a new student with valid data including attachments.
Verify student is listed and details display correctly.
Update student details with valid modifications.
Validate updates are saved and reflected in UI.
Delete the created student.
Confirm student is removed from the listing.

title: Student CRUD Validation Errors
description: Verify validation errors are triggered for incorrect or missing required fields during create or update.

steps.description: Open new student form.
Attempt to submit form with missing mandatory fields.
Ensure validation error messages are displayed per field.
Input invalid data formats (e.g. invalid email, incorrect file types for attachments).
Check for appropriate field-level error notifications.

title: Training Directives Creation and Versioning
description: Create, edit, version, and publish training directives with input validation and rule application.

steps.description: Navigate to the Training Directives module.
Create a new training directive with mandatory fields.
Validate directive saves and appears in the list.
Edit the directive and create a new version.
Confirm versioning system records changes and allows switching between versions.
Publish a directive and set it as default.
Verify published status and default directive flag.

title: Training Directives Rule Creation and Application
description: Test creation of tag-based rules with various operators and parameters, ensuring accurate decision outputs applied over student data.

steps.description: Open training directive rule creation interface.
Define rules using different tags, operators (equals, greater than, less than), and priorities.
Verify rules save successfully with no errors.
Apply rules to sample student data.
Confirm correct output parameters are computed and displayed.

title: Catalogues Rendering and Validation
description: Validate rendering, input, and search functionalities for RIR scale, anthropometric protocols (with LaTeX formulas), readiness scales, and tag catalogs.

steps.description: Access each catalog module separately.
Confirm correct rendering of visual elements including LaTeX formula display.
Perform searches using text and tags in each catalog.
Verify search results are accurate and input validation blocks invalid entries.

title: Relationship Thread Lifecycle
description: Verify full creation, modification, and closure of relationship threads with event logging for notes, tasks, templates, and reminders.

steps.description: Create a new relationship thread linked to a student and optionally a service.
Add diverse event types: notes, create and close tasks, apply message templates with live preview.
Check thread events are logged properly with timestamps and user info.
Close and archive the thread.
Verify thread status updates to closed and is no longer editable.

title: Kanban Workflow with WIP Limits
description: Test kanban board functionality enforcing WIP limits, drag-and-drop between columns, and dynamic badge updates based on tasks.

steps.description: Access the Kanban system for workflow management.
Create several tasks and move them between columns via drag-and-drop.
Validate that WIP limits prevent moving tasks beyond allowed thresholds.
Check that task count badges update dynamically in real time.

title: Reminder Engine Rule Setup and Execution
description: Validate creation of reminder rules, simulate their execution, and verify internal triggering of notifications with toast messages.

steps.description: Navigate to reminder engine UI and create rules for upcoming tasks or follow-ups.
Simulate reminder execution for configured rules.
Verify internal notifications are triggered accurately without external messaging.
Confirm success toast notification displays with counters updating accordingly.

title: Accessibility and Keyboard Navigation
description: Verify that all UI components including modals, buttons, lists, and forms have correct ARIA roles, data-testid markers, are keyboard navigable with proper focus order and visible focus states.

steps.description: Manually navigate through key user flows using keyboard only.
Check that focus outlines are visible and logical in order.
Validate the presence of appropriate ARIA roles on interactive elements.
Ensure all QA automation selectors (data-testid) exist on relevant components.

title: Performance Benchmarking of Core Functionalities
description: Measure and validate that core functionality response times, including navigation, data loading, and action executions, are under 400ms for P95 latency as per performance criteria.

steps.description: Execute sample queries and user actions on student CRUD, relationship threads, and directives.
Collect query timing logs and verify P95 latency is under 400ms.

title: Role-Level Security Enforcement
description: Test Row Level Security (RLS) policies by verifying data access is correctly restricted by user role and organization on all modules and API endpoints.

steps.description: Log in as different user roles (trainer, admin, limited role).
Attempt to access student data, training directives, and relationship threads outside of assigned organization.
Ensure access is denied and no unauthorized data is exposed.

title: Audit Log Recording of All Data Operations
description: Verify that every create, update, delete, and state change over students, directives, threads, tasks, and reminders is recorded correctly in audit logs.

steps.description: Perform data operations for a variety of entities in the system.
Review audit logs to confirm accurate recording with timestamps, user IDs, and operation details.

title: Automated Test Suite Pass and Regression Check
description: Run all automated end-to-end and unit test suites using TestSprite, Puppeteer, Jest, and Vitest to confirm 100% pass rates and no regressions.

steps.description: Trigger complete automated tests using CI pipeline or local environment.
Confirm all tests pass with no errors.
Validate test coverage metrics meet or exceed requirements.

title: Responsive UI Layout and No Undue Scrolling
description: Verify UI adapts well on different viewport sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile) and no unnecessary scrollbars appear on core screens and modals.

steps.description: Resize viewport to representative device sizes.
Confirm layout components adjust responsively and maintain usability.
Ensure zero undue scrollbars and proper content visibility on all main pages and popups.
